resp = client.render_search_template(
    source={
        "query": {
            "match": {
                "user.group.emails": "{{#join}}emails{{/join}}"
            }
        }
    },
    params={
        "emails": [
            "user1@example.com",
            "user_one@example.com"
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)
